ideas.title: Phase 45: Low conf + High volume (data-driven)
ideas.description: Analysis of 19K signals shows: conf<0.22 AND vol_spike>1.2 gives 7.9% signal win rate (+52% vs baseline). Combined with combo_dow base config (50% SL, 10% TP, skip Mon/Fri).
ideas.hypothesis: Low confidence + high volume = model uncertain but market active = best entries

ideas.title: FIX: Invert confidence (raw conf negatively correlated with wins)
ideas.description: Data analysis confirmed: raw_conf ↔ win_rate = -0.083 (NEGATIVE). High confidence = MORE LIKELY TO LOSE. Invert confidence before calibration.
ideas.hypothesis: Inverting confidence will fix the fundamental correlation issue

ideas.title: ARCH: EV Gate (expected value after costs)
ideas.description: Gate on positive EV accounting for spread, slippage, theta decay. Eliminates high-confidence negative EV trades.
ideas.hypothesis: High confidence doesn't mean positive EV when costs dominate

ideas.title: ARCH: Per-regime calibration
ideas.description: Separate calibrators per HMM regime + time-of-day. 70% confidence in low-vol open != 70% in high-vol close.
ideas.hypothesis: Regime-specific calibration improves ECE and confidence usefulness

ideas.title: ARCH: Auto-disable underperforming regimes
ideas.description: Track performance per regime, auto-disable trading in regimes with negative expectancy.
ideas.hypothesis: Some regimes consistently lose - stop trading them

ideas.title: ARCH: Combined - EV Gate + Regime Attribution
ideas.description: Use EV gate AND per-regime tracking with auto-disable together.
ideas.hypothesis: Multiple filters working together = highest quality trades

ideas.title: ARCH: Greeks-aware stops (vol-adjusted)
ideas.description: Express stops in ATR/sigma units, not fixed %. Account for delta/gamma. Reduces wiggle stop-outs.
ideas.hypothesis: Vol-adjusted stops reduce premature exits in high-gamma regimes

ideas.title: ARCH: Freeze NN weights (stable calibration)
ideas.description: Freeze predictor weights during session, only update calibrators + thresholds online.
ideas.hypothesis: Frequent retraining destabilizes calibration - freeze for stability

ideas.title: DATA: Inverted confidence (40-50% sweet spot)
ideas.description: Analysis shows 40-50% calibrated confidence has 41.2% WR vs 31-33% for 60%+. Trade when model is UNCERTAIN, not confident.
ideas.hypothesis: Model overconfidence predicts LOSING trades. Lower confidence = better.

ideas.title: DATA: High consensus strength filter (>=0.28)
ideas.description: Signal reasoning analysis shows consensus strength >=0.28 has 50-67% WR vs 27% for lower strength.
ideas.hypothesis: Multi-timeframe agreement strength is a strong win predictor

ideas.title: DATA: Strict 30-minute max hold (not 31+)
ideas.description: 30-min exit has 41.3% WR, 31-min drops to 32%, 32-min to 12.5%. Force exact 30-min exit.
ideas.hypothesis: Extra minutes after 30 hurt performance significantly

ideas.title: DATA: Combined - Inverted conf + High consensus
ideas.description: Combine both winning signals: 40-50% confidence AND consensus strength >= 0.28
ideas.hypothesis: Uncertain model + strong consensus = highest quality trades

ideas.title: DATA: Disable confidence gate entirely
ideas.description: Since higher confidence = worse WR, try disabling confidence filtering completely
ideas.hypothesis: Confidence filter is counterproductive - removing it may help

ideas.title: BEST: V3 Multi-Horizon + Calibration Gate
ideas.description: Build on exp35_v3_multi (+3118% P&L) by adding calibration gate for higher win rate.
ideas.hypothesis: V3 architecture + calibrated confidence = best of both worlds

ideas.title: V3 Multi-Horizon 20K training
ideas.description: Extend V3 training to 20K cycles for better learning.
ideas.hypothesis: Longer training on V3 will improve per-trade P&L further

ideas.title: V3 + Strict HMM (0.75/0.25)
ideas.description: V3 Multi-Horizon with stricter HMM regime filtering.
ideas.hypothesis: V3 predictions + strong HMM trend = higher quality entries

ideas.title: V3 + Pretrained weights
ideas.description: V3 architecture starting from pretrained/trained_model.pth weights.
ideas.hypothesis: Pretrained weights + V3 architecture = faster convergence

ideas.title: PRIORITY: 50K pretrain for conservative NN
ideas.description: Train for 50K cycles to get very conservative neural network outputs like dec_validation_v2. The key is extreme selectivity.
ideas.hypothesis: Long training = conservative predictions = 2% trade rate = 60%+ win rate

ideas.title: PRIORITY: 70% calibrated confidence gate
ideas.description: Only trade when calibrated P(profit) >= 70%. Target 2-5% trade rate.
ideas.hypothesis: Extreme selectivity via calibration = 60%+ win rate

ideas.title: PRIORITY: Load dec_validation_v2 RL weights
ideas.description: Load the saved unified_rl.pth from dec_validation_v2 and test with calibration gate.
ideas.hypothesis: RL weights + calibration = replicate 60% behavior

ideas.title: Ultra-strict: HMM 0.85 + Calibration 65%
ideas.description: Require very strong HMM trend (>0.85 or <0.15) AND calibrated confidence >65%.
ideas.hypothesis: Double extreme filtering = highest quality trades only

ideas.title: 30K training on Sept-Dec data
ideas.description: Longer training period on 4 months of data for better pattern learning.
ideas.hypothesis: More training data + longer training = better generalization

ideas.title: Minimum edge threshold 0.5%
ideas.description: Only trade when predicted return > 0.5% (higher bar for entry).
ideas.hypothesis: Higher edge requirement = fewer but better trades

ideas.title: V3 + Transformer + Calibration gate
ideas.description: Combine best architecture (V3) with transformer encoder and calibration
ideas.hypothesis: Best architecture + best filtering = best results

ideas.title: HMM pure mode with strict thresholds
ideas.description: Only use HMM signals, ignore neural network entirely
ideas.hypothesis: HMM was profitable in bandit mode - test pure HMM

ideas.title: V3 Multi-Horizon + Transformer encoder
ideas.description: Combine best architecture (V3) with best encoder (Transformer). V3 gives multi-horizon predictions, Transformer generalizes to OOS.
ideas.hypothesis: V3 architecture + Transformer encoder = best of both worlds for OOS

ideas.title: Symmetric exits (-10%/+10%) with Transformer
ideas.description: Fix exit asymmetry issue. -8%/+12% requires 40% WR to break even. Symmetric -10%/+10% only requires 50% WR.
ideas.hypothesis: Symmetric exits reduce breakeven threshold, improving edge capture

ideas.title: Wider TP (-8%/+20%) with Transformer
ideas.description: Let winners run longer. Current +12% TP may cut profits too early.
ideas.hypothesis: Wider TP lets trending moves develop fully

ideas.title: Shorter max hold (20 min) with Transformer
ideas.description: Match prediction horizon (15min) with max hold time. 45 min hold exceeds 15 min prediction.
ideas.hypothesis: Holding beyond prediction horizon causes reversals

ideas.title: Transformer + 5K training (less overfitting)
ideas.description: Test if shorter training (5K vs 10K) reduces overfitting further.
ideas.hypothesis: Less training = less overfitting = better OOS

ideas.title: Stricter HMM (0.75/0.25) with Transformer
ideas.description: Require stronger HMM trend signals. Current 0.65/0.35 may be too loose.
ideas.hypothesis: Stricter HMM filtering = fewer but higher quality entries

ideas.title: Tight stop -5% with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Tighter stops reduce large losses

ideas.title: Wide stop -15% with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Wider stops avoid premature exits

ideas.title: TP +15% with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Medium-wide TP balances profit capture

ideas.title: TP +25% with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Very wide TP lets big winners run

ideas.title: Max hold 30min with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: 30 min closer to 15 min prediction horizon

ideas.title: Max hold 60min with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Longer hold for bigger moves

ideas.title: Aggressive: -5%/+8%/20min with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Quick trades with tight risk control

ideas.title: Patient: -12%/+20%/60min with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Let trades develop fully

ideas.title: Relaxed HMM 0.60/0.40 with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: More trades might improve total P&L

ideas.title: Very strict HMM 0.80/0.20 with Transformer
ideas.hypothesis: Only strongest trends = highest quality

ideas.title: V3 + Transformer + 15min horizon
ideas.hypothesis: Match prediction to hold time

ideas.title: V3 + Transformer + 30min horizon
ideas.hypothesis: Longer horizon for bigger moves

ideas.title: Transformer 15K cycles
ideas.hypothesis: Optimal training length between 10K and 20K

ideas.title: Transformer with dropout 0.2
ideas.hypothesis: More dropout = less overfitting

ideas.title: BEST BET: V3+Trans+Sym exits+20min hold
ideas.hypothesis: Combine all OOS-friendly settings

ideas.title: BEST BET: Trans+StrictHMM+TightExits
ideas.hypothesis: Quality over quantity with fast exits

ideas.title: OOS: V3+Transformer on December (IDEA-144 winner)
ideas.description: Load pretrained model from IDEA-144 (48.1% WR, +12% P&L) and validate on December OOS period
ideas.hypothesis: V3+Transformer showed best WR in training, validate on unseen data

ideas.title: OOS: Wider TP (+20%) on December (IDEA-146 winner)
ideas.description: Load pretrained model from IDEA-146 (+66.6% P&L, +$74/trade) and validate on December OOS period
ideas.hypothesis: Wider TP showed best P&L in training, validate on unseen data

ideas.title: OOS: Symmetric exits on December (IDEA-145)
ideas.description: Load pretrained model from IDEA-145 (+17.6% P&L) and validate on December OOS period
ideas.hypothesis: Symmetric exits showed solid P&L, validate on unseen data

ideas.title: OOS: TP +25% on December (IDEA-153 BEST +91.44%)
ideas.description: Load pretrained model from IDEA-153 (+91.44% P&L, +$101/trade) - CURRENT BEST - validate on December OOS
ideas.hypothesis: Widest TP showed best P&L in training, validate on unseen data

ideas.title: COMBO: TP +25% + Entropy Confidence (best P&L + best WR)
ideas.description: Combine TP +25% (+91.44% P&L, 40.3% OOS WR) with entropy confidence (+9.2pp WR boost). Target: 49%+ WR with high P&L.
ideas.hypothesis: Wide TP for big winners + entropy confidence for better entry selection = best of both
ideas.validation_plan: Train and test - expect ~49% WR with high P&L

ideas.title: COMBO: TP +25% + Entropy + V3 Transformer
ideas.description: Triple combo: V3 architecture + Transformer + TP +25% + Entropy confidence
ideas.hypothesis: Best architecture + best encoder + best exits + best entry filter
ideas.validation_plan: Train and test - combine all winning elements

ideas.title: Even wider TP +30% (push the limit)
ideas.description: TP +25% showed +91% P&L. Test if +30% is even better.
ideas.hypothesis: If wider TP helps, even wider might help more

ideas.title: Trailing stop instead of fixed TP
ideas.description: Use trailing stop (activate at +10%, trail 5%) instead of fixed TP. Let winners run indefinitely.
ideas.hypothesis: Trailing stops capture more upside than fixed TP

ideas.title: VIX-adaptive exits (wider in low VIX)
ideas.description: Dynamic TP based on VIX: Low VIX (<15) = TP +30%, High VIX (>25) = TP +15%
ideas.hypothesis: Low VIX = trending markets = let winners run longer

ideas.title: Time-of-day filter (avoid first 30 min)
ideas.description: Skip trading in first 30 min after open (9:30-10:00 AM). Market is choppy.
ideas.hypothesis: Opening volatility causes whipsaws - skip it

ideas.title: Only trade 10AM-2PM (optimal hours)
ideas.description: Restrict trading to 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM. Avoid open/close volatility.
ideas.hypothesis: Mid-day is more predictable, trends develop better

ideas.title: Entropy-based position sizing
ideas.description: Size positions based on entropy: Low entropy (confident) = full size, High entropy = half size
ideas.hypothesis: Bet more when model is confident, less when uncertain

ideas.title: Tighter stop -5% with wide TP +25%
ideas.description: Combine tight stop (-5%) with wide TP (+25%). Cut losers fast, let winners run.
ideas.hypothesis: Asymmetric risk/reward in our favor

ideas.title: Volume spike filter (only high volume)
ideas.description: Only enter when volume is >1.5x average. High volume = real moves.
ideas.hypothesis: High volume confirms direction, low volume = fake moves

ideas.title: Momentum confirmation filter
ideas.description: Only enter when 5-min momentum aligns with signal direction
ideas.hypothesis: Trading with momentum improves win rate

ideas.title: ULTIMATE: All winning features combined
ideas.description: Combine: TP +25%, Entropy confidence, Trailing stop, Time filter (10-2), Momentum confirm
ideas.hypothesis: Stack all improvements for maximum edge

ideas.title: OOS: Trailing stop on December (BEST +250%)
ideas.description: Validate IDEA-173 (trailing stop) on December OOS. Current best at +250% P&L.
ideas.hypothesis: Trailing stop strategy generalizes to unseen data

ideas.title: Trailing: Tighter trail 3% (lock more profit)
ideas.description: Same as IDEA-173 but with 3% trail distance instead of 5%
ideas.hypothesis: Tighter trail locks in more profit on reversals

ideas.title: Trailing: Earlier activation at +5%
ideas.description: Activate trailing stop earlier at +5% instead of +10%
ideas.hypothesis: Earlier activation protects gains sooner

ideas.title: Trailing: Later activation at +15%
ideas.description: Activate trailing stop later at +15% - give winners more room
ideas.hypothesis: Later activation lets trends develop more

ideas.title: Trailing + Tighter stop -5% (cut losers faster)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with tighter -5% stop loss
ideas.hypothesis: Cut losers fast + let winners run = asymmetric edge

ideas.title: Trailing + V3 + Transformer (architecture combo)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with V3 multi-horizon predictor
ideas.hypothesis: Better predictions + trailing stop = more winners that run

ideas.title: Trailing + Time filter 10AM-2PM
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with optimal trading hours
ideas.hypothesis: Best exit strategy + best time = compounded edge

ideas.title: Trailing + Stricter HMM 0.75/0.25
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with stricter HMM filtering
ideas.hypothesis: Higher quality entries + trailing stop = fewer but bigger winners

ideas.title: ULTIMATE TRAILING: All optimizations combined
ideas.description: Trailing + V3 + Entropy + Time filter + Strict HMM
ideas.hypothesis: Stack all winning elements with trailing stop

ideas.title: DATA-DRIVEN: Only trade 11AM-1PM (9.3% WR window)
ideas.description: Analysis shows 11AM-1PM has 8-9% WR vs 0.3-0.7% in afternoon. Massive edge.
ideas.hypothesis: Midday has cleaner trends, afternoon is choppy reversals

ideas.title: DATA-DRIVEN: Volume spike > 1.3 filter
ideas.description: Winners have 1.24 vol spike vs 0.94 losers. Filter >1.3 gives +2.8pp WR.
ideas.hypothesis: High volume confirms real moves, low volume = fake breakouts

ideas.title: DATA-DRIVEN: Skip 1PM-3PM entirely (0.3-0.7% WR)
ideas.description: Afternoon hours have near-zero win rate. Block all trades 1PM-3PM.
ideas.hypothesis: Afternoon reversals kill trades - just avoid them

ideas.title: COMBO: 11AM-1PM + Volume > 1.3 + Trailing
ideas.description: Combine best time window with volume filter and trailing stop
ideas.hypothesis: Stack all data-driven filters for maximum edge

ideas.title: DATA-DRIVEN: Low confidence filter (< 0.25)
ideas.description: Winners have LOWER confidence (0.22) than losers (0.25). Filter for low conf.
ideas.hypothesis: High confidence = overfit prediction = worse outcome

ideas.title: ULTIMATE DATA-DRIVEN: All filters combined
ideas.description: 11AM-1PM + Volume>1.3 + Low conf + Trailing + Entropy
ideas.hypothesis: Maximum filtering based on actual data patterns

ideas.title: Favor PUTS over CALLS (4.8% vs 4.0% WR)
ideas.description: PUTS have slightly higher WR. Weight puts more heavily.
ideas.hypothesis: Market has slight downward bias or puts are better priced

ideas.title: SENTIMENT: Alpha Vantage News Sentiment API
ideas.description: Integrate Alpha Vantage NEWS_SENTIMENT endpoint for SPY. Get real-time sentiment scores from financial news. Use sentiment_score > 0.3 for bullish, < -0.3 for bearish confirmation.
ideas.hypothesis: News sentiment provides leading indicator - positive news + bullish HMM = higher win rate

ideas.title: SENTIMENT: Fear & Greed Index (CNN)
ideas.description: Scrape/API CNN Fear & Greed Index. Extreme fear (<25) = contrarian bullish, Extreme greed (>75) = contrarian bearish. Use as filter or position sizing.
ideas.hypothesis: Extreme sentiment = reversal opportunities. Fear = buy, Greed = sell

ideas.title: SENTIMENT: Enhanced Put/Call Ratio (already have data)
ideas.description: Use existing vol_put_call_ratio more aggressively. PCR > 1.2 = fear (contrarian bullish), PCR < 0.7 = greed (contrarian bearish). Filter trades to align with PCR signal.
ideas.hypothesis: Extreme PCR is a reliable contrarian indicator - already have this data, just need to use it better

ideas.title: COMBO: Trailing Stop + PCR Sentiment Filter
ideas.description: Combine best strategy (trailing stop +250%) with Put/Call ratio filter. Only trade when PCR confirms direction.
ideas.hypothesis: PCR filter will cut bad trades while trailing stop lets winners run

ideas.title: SENTIMENT: VIX as Sentiment (extreme levels only)
ideas.description: Use VIX as sentiment indicator. VIX > 25 = extreme fear (favor calls), VIX < 12 = complacency (favor puts or no trade). Already have VIX data.
ideas.hypothesis: VIX extremes are reliable contrarian signals - high VIX = oversold, low VIX = overbought

ideas.title: ULTIMATE SENTIMENT: PCR + VIX + Trailing Stop
ideas.description: Triple combo: (1) PCR > 1.2 for calls, PCR < 0.7 for puts, (2) VIX alignment, (3) Trailing stop exit. Only trade on sentiment confluence.
ideas.hypothesis: Multiple sentiment signals aligning = higher conviction trades

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + Volume > 1.3 (data-proven filter)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop (+250%) with volume spike > 1.3 filter. Data shows +61% WR improvement (7.1% vs 4.4% signal WR). Should cut bad trades while keeping winners.
ideas.hypothesis: Volume confirms institutional activity - high volume + trailing = best of both

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + Sentiment (Fear & Greed < 40)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with Fear & Greed sentiment filter. Only trade when market is in fear (FG < 40) - contrarian bullish. Current FG = 25 (Extreme Fear).
ideas.hypothesis: Fear = best time to buy. Trailing lets winners run during recovery.

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + Low Confidence (< 0.25)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with INVERSE confidence filter. Data shows winners have LOWER confidence (0.22 vs 0.25). Filter for confidence < 0.25.
ideas.hypothesis: Low model confidence = market uncertainty = opportunity for trend followers

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + PCR > 1.1 (fear signal)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with Put/Call Ratio filter. High PCR (> 1.1) indicates fear - contrarian bullish signal. Use new sentiment features.
ideas.hypothesis: High put buying = retail panic = time to buy with trailing stop

ideas.title: ULTIMATE BEST: Trailing + Volume + Low Conf + Sentiment
ideas.description: Combine ALL winning filters: (1) Trailing stop, (2) Volume > 1.3, (3) Confidence < 0.25, (4) Fear & Greed < 50. Maximum filter quality.
ideas.hypothesis: Multiple quality filters = fewer but much higher quality trades

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + 11AM-1PM (best hours)
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with time-of-day filter. Previous analysis showed 11AM-1PM has 8-9% WR vs 0.3-0.7% for afternoon. Only trade optimal hours.
ideas.hypothesis: Morning momentum + trailing = catch the best moves

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + V3 Multi-Horizon
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with V3 Multi-Horizon predictor. V3 predicts at 5m/15m/30m/45m and picks best horizon. Better entry timing.
ideas.hypothesis: Better prediction horizon selection = better entry points for trailing

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + Transformer encoder
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop with Transformer temporal encoder. Transformer showed +32.65% OOS P&L in Phase 35. Better pattern recognition.
ideas.hypothesis: Transformer attention = better regime detection = better entry timing

ideas.title: TDA: Topological features for regime detection
ideas.description: Add TDA (Topological Data Analysis) features using giotto-tda. Computes persistent homology on price windows to detect regime changes, loops, and structural patterns that traditional indicators miss.
ideas.hypothesis: TDA captures structural patterns (regime transitions, crash geometry) invisible to traditional indicators

ideas.title: BEST+: Trailing + TDA regime filter
ideas.description: Combine trailing stop (+250%) with TDA features. Use TDA complexity and loop_trend_ratio to filter entries - only trade when topology indicates trending regime.
ideas.hypothesis: TDA can distinguish trending vs choppy regimes - only trade in trending

ideas.title: TDA: Multi-scale windows (30m, 60m, 120m)
ideas.description: Compute TDA features at multiple time scales to capture both intraday and longer patterns. 30m=short-term, 60m=medium, 120m=session-level topology.
ideas.hypothesis: Multi-scale TDA captures patterns at different frequencies

ideas.title: ULTIMATE+: Trailing + TDA + Volume + Sentiment
ideas.description: Combine ALL advanced features: (1) Trailing stop, (2) TDA regime detection, (3) Volume > 1.3, (4) Fear & Greed sentiment. Maximum quality filtering.
ideas.hypothesis: Multiple advanced signals = highest quality entries

ideas.title: TDA-BEST+: Add Volume Filter (>1.2)
ideas.description: Build on IDEA-213 (+74%, 49% WR) by adding volume spike filter. Data shows winners have 1.23 avg volume vs 0.95 for losers. Filter for volume_spike > 1.2.
ideas.hypothesis: Volume spike predicts trade quality - filtering for high volume improves win rate

ideas.title: TDA-BEST+: Low Confidence Cap (max 0.25)
ideas.description: Build on IDEA-213 (+74%, 49% WR) by capping confidence. Data shows winners have 0.21 avg confidence vs 0.24 for losers. Lower confidence = better.
ideas.hypothesis: Model overconfidence predicts losers - trade only when uncertain

ideas.title: TDA-BEST+: Volume + Low Conf Combined
ideas.description: Combine both winning signals: volume > 1.2 AND confidence < 0.25. Should be highest quality trades.
ideas.hypothesis: Both filters together will produce fewer but higher quality trades

ideas.title: TDA-BEST+: Stronger Volume Filter (>1.3)
ideas.description: More aggressive volume filter. Winners cluster around 1.3+ volume spike.
ideas.hypothesis: Higher volume threshold = even better trade quality

ideas.title: TDA-BEST+: 10K Validation Run
ideas.description: Run IDEA-213 config for 10K cycles to validate performance over longer period.
ideas.hypothesis: Longer test will confirm if +74% P&L is consistent

ideas.title: TDA-BEST+: Tighter Trailing (8% activate, 4% trail)
ideas.description: More aggressive trailing stop to lock in profits earlier.
ideas.hypothesis: Tighter trailing reduces drawdown from peak while keeping winners
